sentences: Kauemini ei taha küll niisugust juttu kuulata!
Mida kauemini nad harjutavad, seda ladusamaks läheb mäng. See partii kestis kõige kauemini.
context: The word 'sooviksid' is the conditional form of the verb 'soovima' (to wish/want). In this context, it appears to be paired with 'kauemini' (meaning 'longer') as part of the phrase 'sooviksid kauemini', which translates to 'would like longer' or 'would want for a longer time'. The word indicates a desire or preference for an extended duration.
